timeline.message: Rework citizen entity handling, should avoid fake citizens.

Merge remote-tracking branch 'remotes/origin/version/1.15' into fixFakes

# Conflicts:
#	src/api/java/com/minecolonies/api/util/InventoryUtils.java
Further setup of new skill system
Basically finish skill rework and assign nw skills

timeline.bodyText: hm why are we rerouting requests through here now? and some might cause an NPE with no work building
timeline.author: someaddons

replies.bodyText: Oh, because doing citizenData.getHandler.get seemed a lot of chaining and cluttering elsewhere.
replies.author: Raycoms
Raycoms

timeline.bodyText: I think this is off now, would give a child nearly capped "experience" stats, maybe set a max amount they can inherit, like 5?
timeline.author: someaddons

replies.bodyText: Good that you mentioned it, yes.
replies.author: Raycoms

timeline.bodyText: hm can we make this a for loop? kinda don't like that it can get stuck depending on what ExperienceUtils.getXPNeededForNextLevel returns, incase we somehow got to the max level
timeline.author: someaddons

replies.bodyText: getXPNeededForNextLevel is infinite, even over the max. So that shouldn't be a problem.
replies.author: Raycoms

timeline.bodyText: this isnt needed, same as above
timeline.author: someaddons

replies.bodyText: Unless a new tileEntity was placed, right?
replies.author: Raycoms

replies.bodyText: oh you're right, better leave it then
replies.author: someaddons

replies.bodyText: It grows quadratic as well, so it should be fine
replies.author: Raycoms

timeline.message: remove log, this is no error
